node.statement: POSITIVITY AND NORMALIZATION: For t in (0,1) and x_i > 0, pi(mu) := F*_mu(x;q=1,t) / P*_lambda(x;q=1,t) >= 0 for all mu in S_n(lambda) and sums to 1, hence is a probability distribution. This follows from P*_lambda = sum_mu F*_mu (Hecke symmetrization) and the nonneg of F*_mu at q=1.
